template.name: // Press TAB to expand AnimatedEntity Definition template
template.description: VUEngine File Template Partial: AnimatedEntity definition

variable.name: NUMCHARS
variable.expression: groovyScript("if(_1 == '__ANIMATED_SINGLE' || _1 == '__ANIMATED_SHARED' || _1 == 'ANIMATED_SHARED_COORDINATED') return (_2.toInteger() * _3.toInteger()) else return (_2.toInteger() * _3.toInteger() * _4.toInteger())", ATYPE, FRAMECOLS, FRAMEROWS, FRAMENUM)

template.name: // Press TAB to expand Entity Definition template
template.description: VUEngine File Template Partial: Entity definition

variable.name: NUMCHARS
variable.expression: groovyScript("if(_1 == '__ANIMATED_SINGLE' || _1 == '__ANIMATED_SHARED' || _1 == 'ANIMATED_SHARED_COORDINATED') return (_2.toInteger() * _3.toInteger()) else return (_2.toInteger() * _3.toInteger() * _4.toInteger())", ATYPE, FRAMECOLS, FRAMEROWS, FRAMENUM)
